text: The little boy is reaching for a cookie and he's falling at the same time because the stool has tipped over. His little sister is reaching for a cookie and I think beginning to laugh because he's falling. The sink is running over and putting water on the floor while the mother is trying to to dry the dishes . the window is open and the curtains are blowing and the breeze coming in from outside . water is running in the sink, that's why it's overflowing long silence I also believe that the mother is daydreaming. .. Possibly worried about something. That's it. That's it for all
